definition[0]: something that can be regarded as a sign of something else
example[0]: All the main economic indicators suggest that trade is improving.
definition[1]: one of the lights on a car that flash to show which way the car is turning
definition[2]: a pointer on a machine that shows the temperature, pressure, speed etc
definition[3]: a sign of the level of activity in the economy or in a particular company or financial market
example[1]: All the main indicators suggest that trade is improving.
example[2]: Orders for machine tools are considered an indicator of manufacturersâ€™ optimism.
